Name: Chaos Blade
Availability: Ascension only  Upgrade +10 Katana (Uchigatana, Iaito, Washing Pole) with Soul of Quelaag
Special Note: Every attack that connects also drain user's HP  One handed strong attack is replaced with a dashing slash  Two handed strong attack is replaced by a vertical slash that looks like whip's

Name: Iaito
Special Note: One handed and two handed strong attack is replaced with a running slash

Name: Uchigatana
Availability: Sold by Shiva of the East  Undead Merchant (Male) drop

Name: Washing Pole
Availability: Sold by Shiva of the East
